transTitle: NZ On Air 董事会成员安德鲁·肖 (Andrew Shaw) 因温斯顿·彼得斯 (Winston Peters) 对媒体独立性的批评而辞职

title: Police Commissioner Andrew Coster says he has new Minister’s confidence - but Mark Mitchell still will not comment
transTitle: 警察局长安德鲁·科斯特表示新部长对他有信心，但马克·米切尔仍不予置评

title: Motorist injured after two-car collision near Hastings
transTitle: 黑斯廷斯附近两车相撞，司机受伤

title: New Zealand on Air board member Andrew Shaw quits over comments about Winston Peters
transTitle: 新西兰航空董事会成员安德鲁·肖因评论温斯顿·彼得斯而辞职

title: Auckland Council to offer grants so homes can better withstand bad weather
transTitle: 奥克兰市议会将提供补助金，帮助房屋更好地抵御恶劣天气

title: Taranaki sea rescue: Auckland Westpac Rescue Helicopter winch Cabaret II yacht crew to safety
transTitle: 塔拉纳基海上救援：奥克兰 Westpac 救援直升机绞车 Cabaret II 游艇船员安全抵达

title: Health Minister Dr Shane Reti says more ED security before Christmas, plans to scrap Māori Health Authority under way
transTitle: 卫生部长 Shane Reti 博士表示圣诞节前加强急诊室安全，并计划废除毛利卫生局

title: First transatlantic flight using 100% green fuels set for take-off
transTitle: 首架使用 100% 绿色燃料的跨大西洋航班即将起飞
